trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other types to and from <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: 다른 형식의 인스턴스 간에 변환 <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: GridLengthConverter supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: GridLengthConverter를 다음 형식으로 변환 하도록 지원: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal> <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double> <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32> <xref:System.Int64> <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32> <xref:System.UInt64>.</xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int64> ,</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.GridLengthConverter"></xref> class.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a class can be converted from a given type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 클래스의 인스턴스에 지정 된 형식에서 변환할 수 있는지 여부를 결정 <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter>다음 형식으로 변환 하도록 지원: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal> <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double> <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32> <xref:System.Int64> <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32> <xref:System.UInt64>.</xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int64> ,</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String></xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter>
